page.title: 03ROADS AND TRAFFIC,BROMSGROVE
page.content: Two major{roads }cross our area North to South:A38, single carriageway trunk road linking Bromsgrove with Worcester :the M5{motorway,}a dualcarriage-way now being widened to 3 lanes each way. Our count of northbound{traffic}on 27/6/85 between 14.15 and 14.30 hrs gave 165 cars, 107 lorries, 24 vans, 3 coaches,1 motorcycle and 1 caravan. A similar count, at the junction of Worcester Road and Shrubbery Road, Bromsgrove between 14.15 and 15.00hrs showed 375 cars, 20 lorries, 10 vans, 5 buses, 10 motorcycles, 6 cycles and 4 pedestrians. This was mainly local traffic, as through-traffic uses the Bromsgrove by-pass. A simultaneous count of 440{ car {colour schemes }showed: 120 red, 112 blue, 70 white, 40 green, 38 yellow, 30 black, 28 brown, 1 pink and 1 purple.
